news.title: IBM and the USTA Roll Out AI-Powered Fan Experiences for 2025 US Open
news.summary: -	‘Match Chat’ AI assistant answers questions in real-time, during and after all 254 singles matches

news.title: IBM Study: Sports Fans Demand More Dynamic Digital Content, Powered by AI
news.summary: -	Most fans surveyed agree that AI-powered features will have a significant impact on how they consume sports
